content: neck slightly we recommend the german short row method you can find a great tutorial by verypink knits on youtube here https //www youtube com/watch v=52qy8oob-s0 step 1 rs knit 16 18 22 24 26 29 29 sts work gsr step 2 ws purl to bor marker do not turn continue to step 3 step 3 ws purl 48 50 54 56 58 61 61 sts work gsr step 4 rs knit to bor marker repeat steps 1 - 4 five more times but each time work 3 sts past the last gsr turn note that turn sts look like two sts because of the method used but are worked/counted as 1 st yoke switch to 16 main gauge needles important from here on you will work alternating plain and to work plain stripes bobble stripes with cc after every 14 14 16 16 switch to cc and knit 2 rnds switch back to mc 18 18 20 rounds of the mc your first and last stripes on the body will be plain there will be 7 to work bobble stripes stripes in total the cc stripes will no longer be row 1 switch to cc *k4 mb repeat from * to end of round mentioned in the pattern be sure to keep track of row 2 knit to end of round switch back to mc your mc row as you go see techniques section for instructions on how to make the bobbles increase round 1 size 1 m1 * k14 m1 repeat from * to end 7 times total 8 sts increased 106 sts size 2 * k13 m1 repeat from * to end 8 times total 8 sts increased 112 sts size 3 * k10 m1 repeat from * to last 10 sts 10 times total k10 10 sts increased 120 sts size 4 * k10 m1 k9 m1 repeat from * to end 6 times total 12 sts increased 126 sts size 5 * k12 m1 repeat from * to end 10 times total 10 sts increased 130 sts size 6 * k14 m1 repeat from * to last 14 sts 8 times total k14 8 sts increased 134 sts size 7 * k14 m1 k7 m1 repeat from * to end 6 times total 12 sts increased 138 sts knit 4 4 6 6 8 8 10 rnds © sonder yarn co 2023 | www sonderyarnco com | for personal use only bobbles optional | page 4 increase round 2 size 1 m1 k3 * k2 m1 k3 m1 repeat from * to last 3 sts 20 times total k2 m1 k1 42 sts increased 148 sts size 2 * k2 m1 k3 m1 repeat from * to last 2 sts 22 times total k2 44 sts increased 156 sts size 3 * k2 m1 k3 m1 repeat from * to end 24 times total 48 sts increased 168 sts size 4 k1 * k2 m1 k3 m1 repeat from * to last 5 sts 24
